title: Steve Angello - How To Fake Your Fans

Immediately doing his best to douse the flames of the controversy Steve Angello has taken to his Twitter account to hit back against his detractors and also explain the footage in the video which he retorts is from the climax of his set in which he regularly plays a pre-made edit/bootleg that is syncÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢d up with his flurry of effects.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œWhen i do some festivals i have a team there that does all my pyro, fx and co2Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s, + most of them have a synced ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œfireworks showÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ that is synced to the music so nothing goes wrong for the fireworks show since timing everything is extremely hard for them, so i have a medley mix i close with so they can have everything synced, most big festivals have that and its nothing new, as soon as your closing under a big finale you have that going onÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ Angello wrote on his Twitter. I wanna take this Hater thing to the next level. I wanna fly one over to ibiza to play with my SD cards without headphones and put it on youtube. So whoÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s up for the challenge?ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½
